languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on an enemy, the Operative gains +1 damage and +2% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat. Only applies to the first strike or projectile in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack. Stacks.
languages.original_text: Активируя {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимость{/g}, наложенную на противника, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативник{/g} получает +1 к урону и +2% к {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитию брони{/g} до конца боя. При атаке {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g} применяется только к первому снаряду или удару. Эффект суммируется.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Adept triggers a clue on an enemy, the Adept gains +1 damage and +2% armour penetration until the end of combat. Stacks.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on an enemy, the Operative gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and +2% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat. Only applies to the first projectile in a burst attack. Stacks.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on an enemy, the Operative gains +1 damage and +2% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat. Only applies to the first strike or projectile in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack. Stacks.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on an enemy, the Operative gains +1 damage and +2% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat. Only applies to the first strike or projectile in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack. Stacks.

languages.text: Активируя {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимость{/g}, наложенную на противника, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативник{/g} получает +1 к наносимому урону и +2% к {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитию брони{/g} до конца боя. При атаке {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g} применяется только к первому снаряду или удару. Эффект суммируется.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on an enemy, the Operative gains +1 damage and +2% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat. Only applies to the first strike or projectile in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Активируя уязвимость, наложенную на противника, адепт получает +1 к урону и +2% к пробитию брони до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.
Активируя уязвимость, наложенную на противника, адепт получает +1 к урону и +2% к пробитию брони до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}触发敌人身上的{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}效果时，特工都会获得+1伤害与+2%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。当进行{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}攻击时，此效果只对首次打击或射击生效。此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on an enemy, the Operative gains +1 damage and +2% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat. Only applies to the first strike or projectile in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 每当技师触发敌人身上的{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}效果时，技师都会获得+1{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}与+2%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加。

languages.text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agente{/g} activa una {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidad{/g} del enemigo, gana +1 de daño y +2 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} hasta final del combate. Solo se aplica al primer golpe o proyectil en los ataques de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on an enemy, the Operative gains +1 damage and +2% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat. Only applies to the first strike or projectile in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el agente activa una {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidad{/g} del enemigo, gana +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y +2 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} hasta final del combate. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}が敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}を付与すると、戦闘終了時までオペレーターのダメージが+1、{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通率{/g}が+2%増加する。最初の攻撃、または{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g}攻撃の初弾のみに影響する。この効果はスタックする。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on an enemy, the Operative gains +1 damage and +2% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat. Only applies to the first strike or projectile in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}が敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}を付与すると、戦闘終了時までオペレーターのダメージが+1、{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通率{/g}が+2%増加する。最初の攻撃、または{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g}攻撃の初弾のみに影響する。この効果はスタックする。

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Agent{/g} ein {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzen{/g} auf einen Feind auslöst, erhält der Agent bis zum Ende des Kampfes +1 Schaden und +2 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}. Gilt nur für den ersten Angriff oder das erste Projektil eines {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salvenangriffs{/g}. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on an enemy, the Operative gains +1 damage and +2% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat. Only applies to the first strike or projectile in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Agent ein {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzen{/g} auf einen Feind auslöst, erhält der Agent bis zum Ende des Kampfes +1 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} und +2 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}. Stapelbar.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agent{/g} déclenche une {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnérabilité{/g} sur un ennemi, ses dégâts augmentent de +1 et sa {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} de +2 % jusqu'à la fin du combat. S'applique uniquement au premier coup ou projectile d'une attaque en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g}. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on an enemy, the Operative gains +1 damage and +2% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat. Only applies to the first strike or projectile in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agent{/g} déclenche une {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnérabilité{/g} sur un ennemi, ses dégâts augmentent de +1 et sa {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} de +2 % jusqu'à la fin du combat. S'applique uniquement au premier coup ou projectile d'une attaque en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g}. Cumulable.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Ajan{/g}, bir düşman üzerinde her {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}sömürü{/g} tetiklediğinde verdiği hasar +1 ve {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} özelliği de +%2 artar. Bu etkiler, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Seri saldırılarda{/g} yalnızca ilk atak veya mermiye uygulanır. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on an enemy, the Operative gains +1 damage and +2% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat. Only applies to the first strike or projectile in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack. Stacks.
